feed.title: Cypress Hills (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 30 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
